name: nel1nelin
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wn(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wn(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, c1))

comment: Membership in an intersection implies membership in the first set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
